organizations.title: Microsoft Women of Excellence
organizations.description: The program is held once a year at the Microsoft Israel R&D center in Herzeliya, Israel. The purpose of the program is to give the female students the opportunity to develop personally and professionally, to network and to share advice and experiences with each other.The Women of Excellence program is designed for outstanding students in Computer Science or a related field.
